statements: SELECT * FROM feedback_and_comments;
SELECT feedback_text, user_id FROM feedback_and_comments WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM feedback_and_comments ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback_and_comments WHERE feedback_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT feedback_id, user_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_and_comments WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM feedback_and_comments ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_and_comments WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_and_comments WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedbacks FROM feedback_and_comments GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_feedbacks > 3;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM feedback_and_comments WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT user_id, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT comment FROM feedback WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM comments ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, comment FROM comments WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT comment, user_id FROM feedback WHERE rating = 5 ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT id, user_id, comment FROM feedback WHERE user_id = 10 AND rating < 3 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, user_id, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT id, user_id, created_at FROM comments WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT id, content FROM feedback WHERE id = 3;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id > 10;
SELECT content, created_at FROM feedback WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT id, user_id, content, created_at FROM feedback WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY username;
SELECT feedback.id, feedback.content, comments.content AS comment_content FROM feedback JOIN comments ON feedback.id = comments.feedback_id WHERE feedback.id = 2;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, user_id, feedback_text, submitted_at FROM feedback ORDER BY submitted_at DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, user_id, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT comment_id, commenter_id, comment_text, commented_at FROM comments WHERE feedback_id = 3 ORDER BY commented_at ASC;
SELECT whiteboard_id, whiteboard_name, owner_id, created_at FROM whiteboard WHERE owner_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY submitted_at DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT whiteboard_name, created_at FROM whiteboard ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT feedback_text, submitted_at FROM feedback f JOIN users u ON f.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.username = 'john_doe';
SELECT comment_text FROM comments WHERE comment_id IN (SELECT comment_id FROM feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1);
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT feedback_text, timestamp FROM feedback ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE feedback_id = '323e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM whiteboard_feedback WHERE whiteboard_id = '423e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT users.username, feedback.feedback_text FROM users INNER JOIN feedback ON users.user_id = feedback.user_id;
SELECT feedback.feedback_text, feedback.timestamp, comments.comment_text FROM feedback LEFT JOIN comments ON feedback.feedback_id = comments.feedback_id;

SELECT whiteboards.whiteboard_name, whiteboard_feedback.rating FROM whiteboards INNER JOIN whiteboard_feedback ON whiteboards.whiteboard_id = whiteboard_feedback.whiteboard_id ORDER BY whiteboards.created_at DESC;

SELECT users.username, whiteboards.whiteboard_name, whiteboard_feedback.rating FROM users INNER JOIN whiteboards ON users.user_id = whiteboards.user_id INNER JOIN whiteboard_feedback ON whiteboards.whiteboard_id = whiteboard_feedback.whiteboard_id WHERE whiteboard_feedback.rating > 4;

SELECT feedback.feedback_id, feedback.feedback_text, comments.comment_text, users.username FROM feedback LEFT JOIN comments ON feedback.feedback_id = comments.feedback_id LEFT JOIN users ON feedback.user_id = users.user_id WHERE users.email LIKE '%@example.com%' AND feedback.timestamp > '2022-01-01';
